title: Episode 40: Performance Anxiety (and sopranos on their heads)
description:
Do you get nervous when you perform? Want to learn how to overcome performance anxiety? Listen to a few experienced actors talk about performing and then I'll share some thoughts about what...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Want to learn how to overcome performance anxiety? Listen to a few experienced actors talk about performing and then I'll share some thoughts about what psychologists have to say about those judges in your head who keep you from doing your best.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
